d: Aaron is an athletic shirt or tank top.

s.cutOneStripToFinishTheNeckOpening: Cut one strip to finish the neck opening
s.cutTwoStripsToFinishTheArmholes: Cut two strips to finish the armholes

armholeDrop.d: Lower the armhole by this amount. Negative values will raise it.

backlineBend.d: Determines the shape/bend of the back of the armholes.

hipsEase.d: The amount of ease at your hips.

necklineBend.d: Determines the shape/bend of the neckline at the front.

necklineDrop.d: The amount the neck is cutout at the front.

shoulderStrapPlacement.d: Determines whether the shoulder strap is placed closer to the neck (lower numbers) or the shoulder (higher numbers).

shoulderStrapWidth.d: The width of the shoulder straps.
